scripts.bundle: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.clean: rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && watchman watch-del-all && npm cache clean --force
scripts.clean:ios: cd ios && pod cache clean --all;rm -rf ~/Library/Caches/CocoaPods; rm -rf Pods; rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/*; pod deintegrate; pod setup; pod install;
scripts.build:e2e:ios: cd ios && xcodebuild -workspace example.xcworkspace -configuration Release -scheme example -derivedDataPath build/example -sdk iphonesimulator -quiet && yarn zip:build:ios
